articles.title: Mom and son share videos of daily life with no clean water in Jackson, Mississippi - CNN Video
articles.description: The city of Jackson, Mississippi, has been without clean water for days. Rozetta Womack has resorted to storing water in tubs so it can be boiled and safely used by her and her son.

articles.title: Danielle becomes first hurricane of the 2022 Atlantic season
articles.description: The Atlantic hurricane season's first named storm, which debuted earlier this week, got its full billing Friday.

articles.title: Judge releases full detailed inventory from the Mar-a-Lago search

articles.title: Trump says he will 'very, very seriously' consider January 6 pardons if he runs and wins in 2024

articles.title: Live updates: Trump's special master bid
